name: Moral King
description: Moral King is an interactive movie, which means you can control the protagonist during the movie. Whenever the mouse pointer is visible, you are asked. You have to decide, solve puzzles and react quickly in some places.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or higher Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 10 GB available space
